title: Boards Q&A - September 24th @ 12pm PST [Recap Available]
body:
Summoners!

We're the Boards team and we're here to answer your questions about anything pertaining to the Boards! Please begin to ask questions now, and we'll start answering shortly! :)

**Update**: The Q&A has now been concluded. [Check out the recap now](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/ITeMWouf-boards-qa-recap)!
